body_html:
@shamoya For a simpler model, you could try --model=trivial (the default one) and set your number of batches to a smaller value.

Sorry that I am busying working on migrating my own patch and have little time to reproduce this particular bug right now.

body:
@shamoya For a simpler model, you could try `--model=trivial` (the default one) and set your number of batches to a smaller value. 

Sorry that I am busying working on migrating my own patch and have little time to reproduce this particular bug right now.
